output_list.code: function mint(address _owner, uint32 _heroClassId) onlyAccessMint public returns (uint256)
output_list.reason: The function mint() allows anyone to mint a hero. This is a major vulnerability as it can be used to mint a large number of heroes at once, leading to a large increase in the total supply of the token. The mint function should only be callable by the contract owner or the contract itself.
